com.radiantlogic.iddm.ldap

Class LdapSearchRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radiantlogic.iddm.ldap.LdapSearchRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Request, SearchRequest, LdapRequest

    public final class LdapSearchRequest
extends Object
implements LdapRequest, SearchRequest
    Implements an immutable LDAP "Search Request" based on RFC 4511.

    This class represents an LDAP search operation that queries the directory for entries matching specified criteria, with configurable scope, filters, and result limits.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LdapSearchRequest.DereferencePolicy
      Enumeration defining how the LDAP server should handle aliases encountered during search.
      static class  LdapSearchRequest.LdapSearchRequestBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static LdapSearchRequest create(@NonNull
                                       @NonNull DN baseDN,
                                       @NonNull
                                       @NonNull SearchScope scope,
                                       @NonNull
                                       @NonNull SearchFilter filter)
        Creates a new search request with the specified parameters.

        The LdapSearchRequest returned by this method contains an empty attributes list to specify that all non-operational attributes should be requested.

        Parameters:
        baseDN - Specifies the base DN for the search. Only entries at or below this DN should be searched.
        scope - Specifies the range of entries to search relative to the base DN
        filter - Specifies criteria for which entries should be returned by the search
        Returns:
        A new LdapSearchRequest instance

      • create

        public static LdapSearchRequest create(@NonNull
                                       @NonNull DN baseDN,
                                       @NonNull
                                       @NonNull SearchScope scope,
                                       @NonNull
                                       @NonNull SearchFilter filter,
                                       @NonNull
                                       @NonNull List<Attribute> attributes)
        Creates a new search request with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        baseDN - Specifies the base DN where the search will begin
        scope - The scope of entries that will be searched
        filter - Specifies criteria for which entries should be returned by the search
        attributes - Names of the attributes to return
        Returns:
        A new LdapSearchRequest instance
